item.title: eClerx Services Ltd Gains 0.97%: 4 Key Factors Driving the Week’s Momentum
item.description: eClerx Services Ltd closed the week ending 2 January 2026 with a modest gain of 0.97%, rising from Rs.4,679.80 to Rs.4,725.00. This performance, while positive, lagged behind the Sensex’s 1.35% advance over the same period. The week was marked by a series of technical momentum shifts, a significant upgrade to a Strong Buy rating, and evolving valuation metrics that together shaped investor sentiment and price action. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: Mangalore Refinery & Petrochemicals Ltd. Gains 4.45%: Mixed Technical Signals Shape Weekly Momentum
item.description: Mangalore Refinery & Petrochemicals Ltd. (MRPL) closed the week ending 2 January 2026 with a 4.45% gain, outperforming the Sensex’s 1.35% rise over the same period. item.title: Pankaj Polymers Gains 27.46%: 8 Key Factors Driving the Rally

item.title: Filatex Fashions Ltd Falls 8.57%: 5 Key Factors Behind the Volatile Week
item.description: Filatex Fashions Ltd’s stock endured a turbulent week from 29 December 2025 to 2 January 2026, closing down 8.57% at Rs.0.32 despite a strong Sensex rally of 1.35%.
